summary: This script continuously runs the "chat_with_session_id.js" Node.js program in a loop, likely for testing or maintaining an active conversation state.

details.comment: This script continuously runs the "chat_with_session_id.js" Node.js program in a loop, likely for testing or maintaining an active conversation state.
details.content:
cd /root/Desktop/works/pyjom/tests/microsoft_xiaobing_conversation_bing
while true; do
    node chat_with_session_id.js
done
